description: Switches input HDMI 1 to output A.
Switches input HDMI 2 to output A.
Switches input HDMI 3 to output A.
Switches input HDMI 4 to output A.
Sets Multiview mode 1 (1 WINDOW Full).
Sets Multiview mode 2 (2 WINDOWS Picture-by-Picture).
Sets Multiview mode 3 (3 WINDOWS 2UID layout).
Sets Multiview mode 4 (4 WINDOWS same size).
Sets Multiview mode 5 (2 WINDOWS PIP, top-left).
Sets Multiview mode 6 (2 WINDOWS PIP, bottom-left).
Sets Multiview mode 7 (2 WINDOWS PIP, top-right).
Sets Multiview mode 8 (2 WINDOWS PIP, bottom-right).
Sets Multiview mode 9 (4 WINDOWS PBP, 3 left/1 right).
Sets Multiview mode 10 (4 WINDOWS PBP, 1 left/3 right).
Sets Multiview mode 11 (4 WINDOWS PBP, 3 top/1 bottom).
Sets Multiview mode 12 (4 WINDOWS PBP, 1 top/3 bottom).
Sets Multiview mode 13 (4 WINDOWS PIP, 1 main with 3 on left).
Sets Multiview mode 14 (4 WINDOWS PIP, 1 main with 3 on right).
Sets Multiview mode 15 (4 WINDOWS PIP, 1 main with 3 on top).
Sets Multiview mode 16 (4 WINDOWS PIP, 1 main with 3 on bottom).
Sets Multiview mode 17 (User Config 1).
Sets Multiview mode 18 (User Config 2).
Sets Multiview mode 19 (User Config 3).
Sets Multiview mode 20 (User Config 4).
Swaps the input source configuration between HDMI inputs.
Resizes the display windows (optionally accepts a configuration).
Retrieves the current Multiview mode of the switcher.
Establishes a Telnet connection to the HDMI switcher (host/port in JSON).
Closes the active Telnet connection to the HDMI switcher.
Confirms that the Flask server is running.
